title: NetHack 2.2a source code
html:
NetHack 2.2a source code

From NetHackWiki

Source code
1.0 - 1.3d - 1.4f - 2.2a - 2.3e - 3.0.0 - 3.1.0 - 3.2.0 - 3.3.0 - 3.4.0 - 3.4.3 - 3.6.0 - 3.6.1
SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2 - SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F3 (incomplete)
Statistics - Source diving - Annotations

This page contains links to the source code of NetHack 2.2a. This is an old release; for newer releases, see Source code.

This set of files is from the distribution found here: http://www.juiblex.co.uk/nethack/source/nethack-2.2a.tar.gz
